Package game.maps

Class MapManager

java.lang.Object
game.maps.MapManager
public class MapManager extends Object
A Map Manager class which manages the switching of GameMaps and the Golden Fog Doors used to travel in between them. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:

      public void generateGoldenRunes(GoldenRunes goldenRunes, int minimum, int maximum)
      A method to create random amount of Golden Runes and scatter them around the GameMap.
      Parameters:
      goldenRunes - : The GoldenRunes object to generate.
      minimum - : The minimum amount of GoldenRunes to generate in a GameMap.
      maximum - : The maximum amount of GoldenRunes to generate in a GameMap.

    • createSiteOfLostGrace

      public SiteOfLostGrace createSiteOfLostGrace(String name, int xCoord, int yCoord)
      A method to create a Site of Lost Grace in a map.
      Parameters:
      name - : The name of the Site of Lost Grace.
      xCoord - : The x-coordinate of the current Site of Lost Grace in the GameMap.
      yCoord - : The y-coordinate of the current Site of Lost Grace in the GameMap.
      Returns:
      the newly created Site of Lost Grace.

    • createGoldenFogDoors

      public GoldenFogDoor createGoldenFogDoors(String mapName, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap mapSource, int xCoord, int yCoord)
      A method to create a Golden Fog Door in one map, connecting it to a Golden Fog Door in another map.
      Parameters:
      mapName - : The name of the GameMap destionation.
      mapSource - : The GameMap of the current Golden Fog Door.
      xCoord - : The x-coordinate of the current Golden Fog Door in the GameMap.
      yCoord - : The y-coordinate of the current Golden Fog Door in the GameMap.
      Returns:
      the newly created Golden Fog Door.

    • connectGoldenFogDoors

      A method to connect two Golden Fog Doors together via their Location.
      Parameters:
      goldenFogDoor - : The Golden Fog Door at the source.
      destination - : The destination the Golden Fog Door goes to.
